album.title: Sinatra Reprise: The Very Good Years

wiki.content:
"Summer Wind" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Easy Listening Chart in the Autumn of 1966.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Summer Wind" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Easy Listening Chart in the Autumn of 1966.

name: Summer Wind
comments: Simply the very  best. Perfect timing and expression.
... and the summer wind .....
Featured on a Simpsons episode, so it's been certified. ;-)
My favorite Sinatra song!!!!!
I'm addicted all of a sudden…
right song after a few scotchs at midnight
Just love Frank,he is one of my favorites and always has been. My mom used io listen to him all the time when  I was 4,5, and 6.
great singer:)
Sing it Frank, who else could do it?
Exquisite! Great song, beautiful voice, and whatever band is accompanying him is playing wonderfully.
@sl8221958 I don't think so, but he did sing a line from "My Way" at the beginning of one of his concets
Summer Winds,one of the tops
Does Morrissey ever cover Frank? Somehow I could just hear him doin' this one.
Jongregory, I totally agree.  There are only three or so Sinatra songs that I really like but this is one of my favorites of all time.
I was never a fan. This one wins you over.
aaaanndd the summer wind
Toonalcious
Good ol' blue eyes
Just awesome :))
